Text.Page:
Many of your soldiers have poisoned themselves by eating unknown plants. I know something that will help.

On either side of the Black Claw stronghold are caves. Inside grow azurebond stalks, whose flowers neutralize many kinds of poison. Bring some to {@LinkCreature:241#1019$$Hoorik} to make antidotes for your soldiers.

After all, we're friends now.
I've made an antidote from the juice of the azurebond flowers. Give it to {@LinkCreature:241#1003#Jaebel}. She may trust it more if it comes from you.
The cave entrance is near the Black Claw stronghold. The flowers grow inside.

You say Hoorik sent it? He seems friendly, but I'll try it first, just in case.

Eeeurgh. That's foul, but I feel all right. I doubt it will harm anyone. If it actually helps my soldiers, I'll send Kabalka a special gift of kamara meat! Thanks for your help, .
